alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BROWN... NORTHEASTERN OUTAGAMIE AND EASTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Navarino Wildlife Area, or 10 miles southeast of Shawano, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pulaski around 750 PM CDT. Green Bay around 805 PM CDT. Bellevue Town around 820 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Little Rapids, Hofa Park, Rose Lawn, Kunesh, De Pere, Lambeau Field, Landstad, Zachow, Hobart, and Leo Frigo Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
